segments.text: Yes . I want to buy a pair of shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you a pattern in your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe sneakers or rubber shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any special brand you would like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I have look at that pair of canvas shoes ? They look nice .
segments.speaker: S2
